Title: Authorizes the trustees of the state university of New York to create an academic review board
Summary: Authorizes the trustees of the state university of New York to create an academic review board for the review of textbooks sold, purchased or used for academic purposes on all state university of New York campuses; provides that such board shall consist of twelve members to implement cost-control policies.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize the trustees of the state university of New York to create an academic review board for the review of textbooks sold, purchased or used for academic purposes on all state university of New York campuses
